If you'd prefer you can browse our entire installation documentation.

title.en: How would you like to manually install Owncast?

instructions.en: Owncast supplies a quick install script that will always install the most recent version and get you running very quickly. However, there are other options.

text.en: I want to use the Owncast Quick Installer Script.
I want to download a release of Owncast.
I want to use my operating system's package manager.
I want to use Site.js to setup Owncast.
